Title: DAMLALINGO
Description: Damlalingo is a web application with the goal to encourage effective and personal language learning. Users can register with 2 languages they are learning and it will then bring them to their own online language journal where they can practice thinking and writing in those respective languages.
Learned: Web Dev, UI/UX, Javascript, Express Apps, Fullstack Dev

Title: JAVA JUNCTION
Description: Java Junction is a web application I built with 3 peers that takes the user's computer GPS location and gives the coffee shops that are within a specified radius. Users can also leave personal comments based on their opinions/experience of coffee shop for future reference.
Learned: Fullstack Dev, Utilizing computer hardware for data, Docker, Containers

Title: RIBBET
Description: This is a PyPi project in which I worked with 3 women to create a virtual frog pet that anyone can download. Users can interact with their frog via command line terminal

Title: Yagmur's Website
Description: This is a website I designed for my sister, Yagmur. She is a mechanical engineer at Purdue University. This was an opportunity to build my web dev skills while also collaborating to understand what a user expected.
